blogPost.excerpt: Your resume is the most important part of your job search, but also one of the hardest to get right. Rezi makes it easy for you with our AI-powered resume builder that generates perfect resume content for you. TL;DR: Nice

localize.description: 您的简历是您求职中最重要的部分，但也是最难做好的部分之一。Rezi通过我们的人工智能驱动的简历生成器，为你生成完美的简历内容，让你轻松搞定。TL;DR: 不错

next.excerpt: Curvenote is a collaborative writing platform for scientists and engineers. Instantly integrate Jupyter outputs into customer reports, research papers, or internal documents, and see real-time comments and versions directly in Jupyter.
next.title: Curvenote - Write, share & remix ideas from Jupyter Notebooks

localize.description: Curvenote是一个科学家和工程师的协作写作平台。即时将Jupyter输出整合到客户报告、研究论文或内部文档中，并直接在Jupyter中查看实时评论和版本。
localize.tagline: 从Jupyter Notebooks中写下、分享和混音想法。

localize.description: Curvenote是一個科學家和工程師的協作寫作平臺。即時將Jupyter輸出整合到客戶報告、研究論文或內部文檔中，並直接在Jupyter中查看實時評論和版本。
localize.tagline: 從Jupyter Notebooks中寫下、分享和混音想法。
